pages.text: By reinforcing a regular cauldron with $(l:bewitchment:introduction/silver)$(item)Silver$(), you can create a $(item)Witch Cauldron$().$(br)This magical cauldron is extremely versatile in use and is namely used for $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Oil Crafting$(), $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brewing$() and $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron#teleport)Teleportation$().

$(marked)Items$() can be tossed into the Witches Cauldron once it $(marked)boils$(). To make it boil, place hot blocks such as $(item)Lava$() or $(item)Magma Blocks$() below it.$(br)Note that the Witch Cauldron often requires $(l:bewitchment:introduction/altars)Altar Power$(), except for $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Oil Crafting$().

pages.title: Teleportation
pages.text: To teleport with a Witch Cauldron, simply throw in an $(item)Ender Pearl$(), step on it and say your destination.$(br)That destination must be another Witches Cauldron that has been named with a $(item)Name Tag$().$(br)Teleportation requires $(marked)Altar Power$().
